formElement.label: Artifact Name:
formElement.documentation: Artifact name in form group:artifact. Artifact will be taken from EF repository.

formElement.label: Artifact Version:
formElement.documentation: Artifact version for retrieval, e.g. 0.0.1. If left empty, latest artifact version will be retrieved.

formElement.label: Artifact Filesystem Location:
formElement.documentation: Path to the folder where the artifact was retrieved or to the artifact itself, e.g. /myArtifactStorage/artifact.war or /my-storage/artifact1/.

formElement.label: EC-Artifactory Configuration Name:
formElement.documentation: Previously defined configuiration name for EC-Artifactory plugin. Please note, that EC-Artifactory plugin must be installed and promoted.

formElement.label: Repository Type (Artifactory):
formElement.documentation: Artifactory repository type. Required if Artifactory is used.

formElement.label: Repository Key (Artifactory):
formElement.documentation: Repository key for the repository in Artifactory, e.g. myrepo, libs-release-local. Required if Artifactory is used.

formElement.label: Organization Path (Artifactory):
formElement.documentation: Organization path for the artifact in Artifactory, e.g. com/mycompany. Required if Artifactory is used.

formElement.label: Artifact Name (Artifactory):
formElement.documentation: Name of the artifact (module name) in the artifactory. E.g. my-artifact. Required if Artifactory is used.

formElement.label: Artifact Version (Artifactory):
formElement.documentation: Artifact's version in Artifactory, e.g. 1.0.0. If left blank, the latest version will be retrieved (Artifactory Pro is required for non-Maven repositories to retrieve the latest version). Required if Artifactory is used.

formElement.label: Extension (Artifactory):
formElement.documentation: Artifact extension, e.g. jar or war. Required if Artifactory is used.

formElement.label: Image Name:
formElement.documentation: Name for the image, e.g. myrepo/image:v1.0.

formElement.label: Registry URL:
formElement.documentation: Registry URL (if not specified, Dockerhub will be used).

formElement.label: Username and Password:
formElement.documentation: Username and password to connect to Docker registry.

formElement.label: Base Image:
formElement.documentation: Base Image for the DockerFile. If not specified, the default base image for the artifact will be used.
The ports to list in the EXPOSE instruction in the DockerFile. If not specified, the default port defined in the template DockerFile for the artifact will be used.
formElement.label: Ports:
Command:
formElement.documentation: Command instruction for the DockerFile. E.g., "executable","param1","param2". If not specified, the default command defined in the template DockerFile for the artifact will be used.

formElement.label: Environment Variables:
formElement.documentation: Multi-line name=value pairs. If specified, merge with any existing environment variables defined in the template DockerFile for the artifact.

formElement.label: Remove Image After Push?:
formElement.documentation: If checked, the built image will be removed from the machine after it is pushed to the registry.
